name: Dont Get Hit! (V4NN)
description:
This is a very simple endless game. The way to play is very easy, by avoiding long navy blocks and trying to take small white blocks as a score enhancer. If you touch the navy blocks, your point will be back to 0 and if you collect the small white blocks, it will give you +1 points. The control is very simple, namely by tapping on your handphone screen / clicking left mouse button on your computer screen. I will update some features for this game, and then I will make a different games. This game can be played on Android, iOS, Windows, Linux, Mac platforms (IOS platform not yet because I haven't downloaded the required assets). If you like the game pls support me by donating some of your sustenance, Thank You :) and sorry for my bad English because this is not my native language.

My Patreon : https://www.patreon.com/V4NN
